modName: Requiem - Tera Armors - Undergarments for All - (Patches)
summary: Standalone patches for compatibility between Requiem, Tera Armors, and Undergarments for All. Can be used for any pair of the listed mods, or all at once.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700]TeraArmors Requiem 2.0 Leveled Lists have been updated to include a chance to spawn full sets of mid-to-high level armors in various treasure chests, up to Glass and Ebony equivalent (vampire boss chests) and enchanted robes (Hagraven chests).[/color]

These are standalone compatibility patches for the following mods:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/]Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49555]ï»¿Undergarments for All
[/url]
Use only the ones you need for the required mods.
All patches can be used together, in any order.
The only requirement is to load them after the mods listed under requirements.
Installing or updating during a playthrough should be safe.
[color=#ff7700]
NOTE:
Includes separate patches for Requiem 1.9.4 and Requiem 2.0.[/color]

Patches currently included:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#f1c232][size=4]1. TeraArmors Requiem Leveled Lists[/size][/color]

Requirements: TERAArmors.esm, Requiem.esp

[b]Requiem 1.9.4:[/b]
Only adds lower-level Tera Armors as equipment variants to Bandits.

[b]Requiem 2.0:[/b]
Currently, the patch adds Tera Armors of the appropriate tier as equipment to some of Requiem enemies, blacksmiths, and generic loot using leveled lists provided by Tera Armors as base.
It also reduces the price of many lower-level Tera Armors to be more in line with other armors, and slightly changes the stats for some of them.
Invisible Helmets are not included in the leveled lists, and their Crafting is removed to reduce menu clutter, as Requiem doesn't rely on matching armor sets.
[size=1](If you do want to craft them, you can use the console to add "CraftTeraHelmetInvisible" perk to yourself, which will enable their crafting again).
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][b]NOTE! If you're adding this patch or updating to patch v1.04 from a previous version, you need to run the Reqtificator.[/b][/color]

Native TeraArmors Leveled Lists file is not required.
Does not disrupt Requiem game balance.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#f1c232][size=4]2. Undergarments for All - Requiem Patch[/size][/color]

Requirements: Requiem.esp, UndergarmentsForAll.esp

Distributes undergarments provided by UFA to outfits edited or added by Requiem.
Sets Requiem-added armors to hide equipped undergarments, preventing clipping.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#f1c232][size=4]3. Undergarments for All - TeraArmors Patch[/size][/color]

Requirements: TERAArmors.esm, UndergarmentsForAll.esp

Sets Tera Armors to hide equipped undergarments, preventing clipping.


[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Also check out my tweaks for Requiem: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88955]Requiem Merciful Tweaks[/url][/center]
author: XArgon42

files.name: Requiem - TeraArmors - UFA - Patches
files.changelogHtml: Added TeraArmor leveled lists for Requiem 2.0

files.name: Requiem - TeraArmors - UFA - Patches
files.changelogHtml:
TeraArmors + Requiem 2.0 (only!): Vampire NPCs can now spawn with Tera Armor sets (in place of Leather, Elven, Glass and Orcish)
Separate UFA patch version for Requiem 2.0 now included.

files.name: Requiem - TeraArmors - UFA - Patches
files.changelogHtml:
TeraArmors + Requiem 2.0: Added armors of the appropriate tier to blacksmith merchant stocks
TeraArmors + Requiem 2.0: Made the Forsworn more fancy by adding Brigandine and Castanic Hunter armors to them

files.name: Requiem - TeraArmors - UFA - Patches
files.changelogHtml:
TA+R2.0: Added TeraArmors to generic loot lists
Hidden all Invisible Helmets from the crafting menu. They are also excluded from the leveled lists
Changed prices for most TeraArmors to be more in line with other Requiem armors, based on stats
Modified stats for a few of the armors
Running Reqtificator is required when updating to this patch version. (TA+R2.0)

files.name: Requiem - TeraArmors - UFA - Patches
files.changelogHtml:
TA+R2.0: More leveled lists now include Tera Armors, including rewards and treasure chests
Full sets of mid-to-high level Tera Armors can spawn in dungeon chests of the appropriate danger level
Now includes Ebony-equivalent armors and some lower-level enchanted robes
Enchantments on the included robes have been nerfed for balance

files.name: Requiem - TeraArmors - UFA - Patches
files.changelogHtml: UFA_TeraArmors_Patch - removed unneeded dependancies from the file.
